thread.title: LBS Prize Alert: Week 7 Pick ’em Pool winner gets free Spartan Rice
thread.title_full: LBS Prize Alert: Week 7 Pick ’em Pool winner gets free Spartan Rice

author: Larry Brown
title: LBS Prize Alert: Week 7 Pick ’em Pool winner gets free Spartan Rice
text:
0 0 
Those who entered the LBS annual Pick ’em Pool were promised some prizes for weekly winners. Well, good news: we have a prize set for the Week 7 winner. 
The Week 7 winner of the pool will receive a code for a free Spartan Race. 
Wondering about Spartan Races? Here’s more from their website : 
“Reebok Spartan Race is innovating obstacle racing on a global scale. With more than 130 races around the world annually – we offer three core races each escalating in distance, obstacle count and challenge level. The Spartan Sprint (3+ miles/20+ obstacles), the Spartan Super (8+ miles/ 25+ obstacles) and Spartan Beast (13+ miles/ 30+ obstacles). Courses are riddled with signature obstacles: mud, barbed wire, walls, rope and fire. Challenge yourself to complete all three and become part of the TRIFECTA tribe.” 
Happy picking!
